website_summaries.verdict: Riding a dinosaur/ATV combination is every bit as exciting as it sounds, and its ability to cruise at decent speeds and its integrated safety features make every drive a great one.
pros: Easily handles grass, dirt, concrete, etc
Detailed recreation of Blue, the velociraptor

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: The pin to hold the tire on broke off on the first ride. Throwing my toddler off.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Anchimbom

customer_reviews.title: 5 Minutes is All Dino Lasted
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer, the pin broke! Our son barely drove it five minutes and the pin that held the tire broke. The tire fell off immediately. I have one sad son. I came to the look for a replacement pin and wasn’t going to leave a review but this is not a reliable toy. $300 for a toy that only last 5 minutes before breaking is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheWhat

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool looking Power Wheels. My son loves dinosaurs, and he also loves driving his big sister's Power Wheels dune racer so this was a win-win for him. It seems well-built, and it was easy to put together. I wish the battery lasted a little longer. Seems like you can get about a solid hour and a half of driving it at max speed. I have a few other batteries on hand that I keep charged in case there are any "emergencies".
customer_reviews.author: CML

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look on my grandsons face when he was riding it it was perfect a awesome gift
customer_reviews.author: Cond

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for our dino loving daughter
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughters fifth birthday and she absolutely LOVES it! She is obsessed with jurrasic world! However the assembly was kind of a pain in the butt! I put it together by myself in less than an hour but there were so many steps and the directions werent that clear. All in all i would order again and recommend to anyone with a dinosaur lover!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy! Our 3 1/2 year old is having the best time with it. The mouth does not move on it’s own. It goes fast and is well made. Assembly was easy. It’s a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur fun
customer_reviews.text: Omg my 3 year old loves this. He is having so much fun with it. My almost 6 year olds and twin 9 year olds can ride it as well! It was easy to assemble and they are having a blast with it
customer_reviews.author: Babbs

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson, but his 6 year old brother loved it as much as he did! It is very cute! And durable. They both road on it for a while. The battery lasted longer than average for a 12V. Grandma won the best gift award this year!
customer_reviews.author: T. Biron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Your Dino Lover!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson LOVES his Dino Rider. We live 6 blocks from park and its hilly, the rider has no problems going up the hills and its battery handles the trips he makes. His Grandpa rides his bike to keep up. It's nice that it has 2 speeds. We gave him rules to follow before we would allow him to have the faster option, once we knew he would follow rules we unscrewed the cover to the green button and he never looked back. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wendy D Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Good but be ready to fix some pins
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this Dino 4 wheeler. It’s nice and sturdy and a good speed for her. I have one complaint though. When we put it together and she rode for the first time the wheel just came off. The pin broke on the first ride but we didn’t want her disappointed so we fixed it ourselves. Just beware guys that there are other reviews saying the same thing about a broken pin on the first ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, very quick, and super fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my dinosaur loving 3 year old’s favorite gift for his birthday! It’s faster than I realized it would be, but there are 2 modes—one slow and one fast—as well as a reverse button. My son figured it out very quickly. It rides through grass, up hills, and is very similar to a tiny 4 wheeler. We are VERY happy with this purchase and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Breen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome except for the wheel clips that snap apart.
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together. The next day my 3 year old waited part all day for 5pm. When I was done with work I took it out for him to ride. And was extremely disappointed.... both front wheel clips snap apart. My neighbor has to go to pep boys and buy a pack of clips for me and he put it together. After 1 hour and a half of watching my little guy sad... He finally got to ride it around for a bit. He loved it and so did I!
customer_reviews.author: Doris H.

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for my little man!
customer_reviews.text: 03/2020 So far so good! My son LOVES it!! Shipping got delayed but I didn't try to stress because I know things happen. I needed it by saturday for my son's party and it got delivered at 8:30 Saturday morning. Perfect timing and well worth the wait!! 06/2020 It still is doing great! My son drives this through the grass, gravel, our fields and even trails in our woods! My 3 yrs old son an 6 yrs old daughter ride this together sometimes too! Battery does great! I absolutely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my large 5-year-old based on the other reviews. I am so impressed with this product and thankful that we could actually afford a Power Wheel. It was easy to put together, and the speed range is incredible. Other reviews stated that once the safety plastic was removed that the power wheel was high-speed, but I can't entirely agree it was actually a perfect speed. I couldn't be more thankful that this was 169, and it arrived quickly. My son cannot wait to ride it every day .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2.5 year old loves it!!! Must get!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life lasts forever! We stayed out almost 2 hours and the batteries lasted! Just taught our 2.5 year old how to go full speed and now we can run with him. Can run about a 10.5 minute mile while our son treks with us! Pretty awesome! Slower run but we are together as a family. Highly recommend!! Our son is so proid on his raptor and says hi to everyone he see's. Neighborhood kids love seeing him on it too. So easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Power seems weak in low range.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our grandson and for now it's locked in low range. Our driveway has a slight slope to it and when he's driving it up the slope it barely seems to be able to pull itself. We haven't removed the lock yet that allows high range so can't say if that would help or not. It was easy to put together and seems to be of good quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoaby

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, good speeds and easy to assemble. Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: This power wheel is fantastic. Assembled in less than 30 minutes, very straight forward. Can support both my boy and myself (combined weight of 200lbs) without damaging it and with virtually no slow down (expect on slopes). Battery lasts long enough for a good play session, was starting to get low after 30 minutes with both of us on it for about 5-10 out of the 30 minutes. I suspect 45-60 minutes per charge is reasonable with only my boy 35lb boy on it. Low speed = normal walk Fast speed = power walk/light jog Reverse = low speed but backwards Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CykWal

customer_reviews.title: You’re My Boy, Blue
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for a Jurassic World fan. Just wished it roared or there was a level to make the mouth chomp but those are minor details. 5 year old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: SarahGR

customer_reviews.title: Our Granddaughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for granddaughters birthday. She is 4 yrs old. She drives it well in the slow setting and will try the faster setting when she is ready. It was also easy to assemble with just a few household tools.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C. Harry

customer_reviews.title: 4 yr old grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Like riding a real dinosaur! This is our third power wheel, and the best quality so far. A little quicker than the others. Easier to assemble. I always cover the rear wheels with MTB tires to make the grip better. Grandson loves riding this.
customer_reviews.author: serotta

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of the 2 was made on a holiday or Friday
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these dino power wheels for my kids and they have had them for 10 days and now on one of them only one rear wheel spins when the throttle is pushed. I've checked the pins that hold the wheels in place and that's not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: brandon s.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas, he loves it!! It has a button to go slow or fast! Traction is good so far! He rides in the dirt over bumps and hills and it’s holding up! We’ve had for a month now and the buttons get stuck sometimes and won’t work. We just push another button and it’ll work again.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Granados

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: We normally don’t write reviews but we are not happy with with this purchase. The Dino racer is missing a rear wheel and front axle. Now the question is how this is even possible and furthermore you are not able to return it you just get a link to the manufacturer and that is no easy task. Our son was heartbroken over this as this was a present for his birthday. Really disappointed amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Randall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good price compared to other sources! My son loves this! Assembly isn't too bad...took about 15 minutes. Battery life is decent...just like any other ride on. Dinosaur graphics is really good!
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: The best Christmas gift a 4 year old can have. My little devil loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe & Jess

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: OMG--this is amazing. You need two people to put together but it's maybe an hour. More power than I expected. Yeah, it would be nice if the tires weren't hard plastic and if it made dino sounds but I am very pleased with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 wheeler
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loves this. He rides it for hours, sometimes that takes more than one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Darren D. Jenner

customer_reviews.title: Fast blue
customer_reviews.text: Great power wheel, this is much faster then the others, we also have the jerassic world jeep and this goes 3 times as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Arm_Ryan2002

customer_reviews.title: dinosaur expert finally has raptor blue wheels
customer_reviews.text: the only reason i gave this four stars is because the reverse doesn’t work but other than that my 3 year old took this mud riding day one and it still runs like a charm and it looks super cool
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: BEST CAR EVER!!! My son is obsessed and calls it his “fast car.” He loves it so much he rides it every day and all day. Best car I’ve ever seen. If your child doesn’t have this they are missing out
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: They definitely need to upgrade the pins
customer_reviews.text: Within 5 minutes of riding this the tire fell completely off bcuz the pins to hold the tire on, broke in half. I replaced it with a keyring and the next day another pin broke. It does get up and go and my son loves it, but it is definitely not safe with those crap pins.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed but it’s still a cool toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought the blue one received the green. My son was disappointed on Christmas ... he still loves it though... just wish it was the one I bought The seller said they don’t even sell the green one it was a warehouse mistake
customer_reviews.author: skyler

customer_reviews.title: If you want it for Christmas, order now.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. After searching forever for this as Blue the Raptor, finally found one that didn't cost me a second mortgage. Drawback, of course is the plastic wheels, but that is easily solved with my Zero Turn Mower tires. Everything else is perfect. Fast shipping, got it in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Love this ride
customer_reviews.text: Why didn’t they have these when we were kids? This thing is fast almost to fast for a toddler. Easy assembly, strong, and just looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday present for grandson that wanted a rideable dino. He loves it but I dont know about the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyBrat05

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old can not get enough of this....;)
customer_reviews.author: Rose Renee Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but the wheels caps were a little difficult to snap in....much easier to assemble than other power wheels we have purchased
customer_reviews.author: kristin gurley

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Put this together on Xmas eve and on both sides of the front the plastic is cracked and it says not eligible for return on amazon site.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It looks great my son loves it but it came broke like the pictures show is not much he can still ride but it was not cheap. Disappointed 😔 I never receive anything broken before and it was for my boys 6 birthday. We just got it but it was easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Friend used my account to buy this for her son and he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Geena Marie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! So much fun. Battery lasts for hours and fits my 5 year old perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MistyDawn

customer_reviews.title: 18hrs to charge the battery before 1st ride.
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock speed settings. My grandson loves this! It's his "dino-cycle". FYI...this does take a good 18hrs to charge the battery so plan ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Woman

customer_reviews.title: Sweet lil rig for lil ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my buddies daughter. She loves the heck out of it! Easy to assemble, just follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Chas w.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for the neighborhood kids. Huge h iui t at the party. Pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Part of the plastic near the wheels Came cracked and the metal front bar came Bent out beard needing to be bent out some to assemble. Ordered two of these my second one got delayed so we’ll see how that one looks when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: jacob januchowski

customer_reviews.title: battery life
customer_reviews.text: Overall the quad is awesome and my son loves it. BUT he gets really annoyed that he needs to constantly charge it. I usually give 5 star. But im frustrated. I have only had it since june. So 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Zana B.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson was blown away!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect my grandson was blown away when he saw it inder the Christmas. He is 4 and I thought it would be to much for him but drove it effectively. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Ms Tweet

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Son is four and absolutely LOVES this car.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Omg this was perfect my son loves it!!!!! I was hesitant but its perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori rossman

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Awsome! My 5 year old loves it. A grown up can ride it
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for my son.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Very sturdy. Battery charger causes a little concern since there is no light indicating when fully charged or any power at all. But my son loves it. So thats all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: My boy loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Had it 3 months now and working great and my boy loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty big power wheels, perfect for our 4 yo. Came with a bent piece for the wheel and the "hub caps" dont really stay on but theyre not important.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That the rear axel can't be modified to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this product a rating of one is because the back axel was too long. The wheels would become disengaged from the power hubs. You would have to push in both wheels to get the toy to engage forward or reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T MOVE WELL ON FLAT SMOOTH DRIVEWAY AT ALL.
customer_reviews.text: THE PLASTIC TIRES WON'T GO AT ALL THROUGH THE GRASS. THE WHEELS WILL NOT TURN WELL AT ALL AND START CLICKING. YOU HAVE TO GIVE THEM A PUSH TO START MOVING.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It goes really fast. Faster than the dune buggy and the Jeep hurricane. We have all three. The kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jo Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Ton of fun
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday present for a 3 year old... did not disappoint! Fun for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Hank R

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: It was great the grandson loves it also it has a safety on it where it will not go to fast untill he gets older
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item. I gave as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for his Christmas gift and he loves it. I mean it's a dinosaur 4 wheeler what kid wouldn't love this. I know he does a that's all that matters to mw.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Siler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My three year old couldn’t be more thrilled! He absolutely loves this and it is def worth it! It actually goes pretty fast, the mouth opens and closes, and it has 2 speeds
customer_reviews.author: Christinah

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Just wish the battery lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old got this for his birthday in July and has been riding it nonstop with his friends
customer_reviews.author: chadc1179

customer_reviews.title: money well spent
customer_reviews.text: i love love love it came just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Toni Foley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything easy to put together works great and my son loves it
customer_reviews.author: joe tallmam

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 year old — he found and fell in love Going to ride it out side on Sunday after ...
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for 4 year old — he found and fell in love Going to ride it out side on Sunday after we buy a helmet and battery is charged
customer_reviews.author: daniel hill

product_meta.title: Power Wheels Jurassic World Dino Racer
product_meta.description:
The Power Wheels Jurassic World Dino Racer sends young adventure seekers roaring into exciting adventures with Blue the raptor! Young riders can race over hard surfaces, grass, and other rough terrain at a max. speed of 6 mph, with a parent-controlled, high-speed lockout for beginner drivers. Kids can even open and close Blue's mouth manually for awesome chomping action! Your young racer will love recreating the exciting, off-road action of the film behind the wheel of this Power Wheels Jurassic World ride-on ATV!

BRAND STORY
Power Wheels: The only way to ride. Is your wanna-be driver looking to gain some behind-the-wheel confidence? We’ve got just the right Power Wheels vehicles—and so many new ways to ride—to empower them to hit the road! Kids at our Fisher-Price Play Lab put these vehicles to the test, so you can feel good giving your kid the thrill of independence as they drive off in in their very own ride-on car, truck or ATV. These battery-powered riding toys are built for hours of fun and endless backyard adventures for toddlers to more experienced drivers!
feature_bullets: Manually open & close Blue's mouth for awesome chomping action
Drives on hard surfaces, grass & rough terrain at maximum speed of 6 mph forward, 3 mph in reverse
Parent-controlled, high-speed lockout and Power-lock brake system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars419 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
